issue.title: [CF 1604] Not tracking Cooldoowns or anything
issue.body:
I'm choosing type of tracking mode, then spell and nothing happens. I can only see Icon of my spell, It doesn't show  any timer. What am I doing wrong?

 

Tried deleting, re-downloading, deleting caches. No idea what I can do more...


> Posted by CurseForge user zaviadaka | Imported from CurseForge issue #1604 | Raw

comments.body:
You need to check the options on the right side that refer to the timer. Show timer, sweep, etc.


> Posted by CurseForge user Jalopyy
